name: Strawberry-Yogurt Parfaits
keywords: dessert, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, mint leaves, strawberry, yogurt, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 pint ripe strawberries, hulled and halved
8 ounces plain whole milk or fat-free yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Place half the berry slices in each of four large stemmed goblets. Sprinkle each portion with a teaspoon of the sugar.

Stir the yogurt to smooth it, then spoon all but one-fourth cup of it over the berries. Top with the remaining berries and a dollop of the remaining yogurt. Sprinkle with the remaining sugar and garnish each serving with a mint leaf.
